attributes.action: tell us what happends in the secret meetings held yearly by the bilderberg group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: each year members of the so called elite meet for a weekend and discuss how they are gonna bring in a new world order and enslave the population if you dont belive me type bilderberg group in google or youtube WAKE UP PEOPLE!!!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
